what: Retrieve WMO OSCAR station metadata — get_stations
title: Retrieve WMO OSCAR station metadata — get_stations
Retrieve WMO OSCAR station metadata — get_stations
code: get_stations(   program = NULL,   country = "BFA",   station_type = NULL,   wigos_id = NULL )

title: Retrieve WMO OSCAR station metadata — get_stations
text: program WMO OSCAR program/network. Example : "GBON","RBCN", etc. country Official ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code (3 letters) station_type WMO OSCAR station type. Example : "landFixed","airMobile" etc. Use oscarr::oscar_station_type() complete list. identifier WIGOS Station identifier. Example : "0-854-0-109".
